  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2118</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2118</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">¡Arriba el telón!</string>
            <string language="en">Raise the curtain!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heben Sie den Vorhang an!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Soulevez le rideau !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Levante a cortina!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alzi la tenda!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυξήστε την κουρτίνα!</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica interactiva (MUD) adreçada al segon curs del cicle mitjà de primària. L'activitat inicial presenta el lèxic relacionat amb el teatre, i les activitats de pràctica (Practica) i d'avaluació (Avalua't) en reforcen els conceptes.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) for 9- to 10-year-olds. The initial activity presents vocabulary for the theatre, while practice and self-assessment activities reinforce the meanings.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió</string>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material multimèdia</string>
            <string language="en">multimedia material</string>
            <string language="es">material multimedia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació primària</string>
            <string language="en">primary education</string>
            <string language="es">educación primaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material didàctic</string>
            <string language="en">teaching materials</string>
            <string language="es">material didáctico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vocabulari</string>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
            <string language="es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) für 
9 zu 10-year-olds. Die Ausgangsaktivität stellt Wortschatz für
das Theater dar, während Praxis- und Selbstbewertungsaktivitäten die
Bedeutungen verstärkt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) pour 9 à 
10-year-olds. L'activité initiale présente le vocabulaire pour
le théâtre, alors que la pratique et les activités de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment renforce les significations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) para 9- a 
10-year-olds. A atividade inicial apresenta o vocabulário para 
o theatre, quando as atividades da prática e do self-assessment 
reforçarem os meanings.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) per 9 a 
10-year-olds. L'attività iniziale presenta il vocabolario per 
il teatro, mentre le attività di valutazione di se stesso e di 
pratica rinforza i significati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) για 9 στο 
10-έτος. Η αρχική δραστηριότητα παρουσιάζει το λεξιλόγιο 
για το θέατρο, ενώ οι δραστηριότητες πρακτικής και 
αυτοαξιολόγησης ενισχύουν τις έννοιες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Multimedia materiell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
